description: Studly and perverted Kip Johnson visits Bella Rossi's Divine Chastity Clinic in hopes to please the judge the next time he has to face the stand. Kip can't stop touching himself everywhere he goes, public places, women's shoe stores, Victoria's Secret's you name it Kip wants to touch his cock! Bella is wickedly sexy and puts Kip through the paces after fitting him with a chastity belt which leaves his cock bulging and dripping through the cage begging for any attention that Bella is willing to give. Tease and denial, punishment and pegging all included!
title: Divine Chastity Clinic
